resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82228</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82228</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4295</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Domestic/International Environment and People in Business (OL)</string>
            <string language="es">Entorno doméstico/internacional y la gente en los negocios (OL)</string>
            <string language="ga">Timpeallacht Intíre/Idirnáisiúnta agus Daoine i nGnó (GL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Domestic/International Umgebung und Leute im 
Geschäft (OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Environnement et personnes de 
Domestic/International dans les affaires (OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ambiente e povos de Domestic/International no 
negócio (OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambiente e la gente di Domestic/International nel
commercio (OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερικοί/διεθνείς περιβάλλον και άνθρωποι στην 
επιχείρηση (OL)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Suggestions for answering Ordinary Level questions (1999) on the topics of People in Business and Domestic/International Environment. Realistic marking schemes and suggested answers are provided.</string>
            <string language="es">Sugerencias para responder a las preguntas del nivel ordinario (1999) sobre los temas de la gente en los negocios y el entorno doméstico/internacional. Se ofrecen esquemas de puntuación realistas y respuestas sugeridas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Moltaí do cheisteanna Gnáthleibhéil (1999) a fhreagairt ar thopaicí Daoine i nGnó agus an Timpeallacht Intíre/Idirnáisiúnta. Cuirtear scéimeanna marcála réadúla agus freagraí molta ar fáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorschläge für das Beantworten der 
gewöhnlichen waagerecht ausgerichteten Fragen (1999) über die Themen
der Leute im Geschäft und in der Domestic/International Umgebung. 
Realistische Markierung Entwürfe und vorgeschlagene Antworten 
werden zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Suggestions pour répondre aux questions de 
niveau ordinaires (1999) sur les sujets des personnes dans les 
affaires et l'environnement de Domestic/International. Des 
arrangements réalistes d'inscription et les réponses suggérées 
sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sugestões para responder às perguntas niveladas
ordinárias (1999) nos tópicos dos povos no negócio e no ambiente de
Domestic/International. Os esquemas realísticos do marking e as
respostas sugeridas são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suggerimenti per rispondere alle domande 
livellate ordinarie (1999) sui soggetti della gente nel commercio e 
nell'ambiente di Domestic/International. Gli schemi realistichi 
della marcatura e le risposte suggerite sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι προτάσεις για στο συνηθισμένο επίπεδο εξετάζουν 
(1999) στα θέματα των ανθρώπων στην επιχείρηση και το 
εσωτερικό/διεθνές περιβάλλον. Τα ρεαλιστικά σχέδια 
χαρακτηρισμού και οι προτεινόμενες απαντήσεις δίνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4295</entry>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        <classification>
